entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 early this morning then light this morning. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:56 AM ADT Monday 27 March 2023
